placeOrder.name: placeOrder
placeOrder.description:
Place an order from the current cart

Returns either an Order on success, CheckoutError on failure,
or PaymentPending if payment is still processing.

examples.name: Place Standard Order
examples.description: Place a standard order with credit card payment

examples.name: Out of Stock Item
examples.description: When an item in the order is no longer available, the order fails with a stock error. The response includes which items are affected.

placeOrder.message: One or more items are out of stock

examples.name: Payment Declined
examples.description: The payment provider declined the transaction. This can happen due to insufficient funds, card expiry, or fraud detection.

placeOrder.message: Payment was declined by your card issuer

details.suggestion: Please try a different payment method or contact your bank

examples.name: Invalid Shipping Address
examples.description: The shipping address could not be validated or is not serviceable by any available shipping method.

placeOrder.message: We cannot ship to the selected address

examples.name: Apply Discount Code
examples.description: Place an order with a promotional discount code applied

examples.name: Expired Discount Code
examples.description: The discount code has expired or reached its usage limit. The order still processes but without the discount.

warnings.message: Discount code 'EXPIRED2023' has expired and was not applied

errors.description: The operation requires a valid authentication token but none was provided or the token has expired.
errors.resolution: Include a valid Bearer token in the Authorization header. If the token has expired, refresh it using the refreshToken mutation.

errors.description: The provided authentication token is malformed or has been tampered with.
errors.resolution: Ensure the token is being passed correctly in the Authorization header as 'Bearer <token>'. If the issue persists, obtain a new token.

errors.description: The authentication token was valid but has now expired. Tokens typically expire after 24 hours.
errors.resolution: Use the refreshToken mutation with your refresh token to obtain a new access token.

errors.description: The provided credentials do not match any active account. This error is returned for both incorrect email and incorrect password to prevent account enumeration.
errors.resolution: Verify the email and password and try again. Use the forgotPassword mutation if you've forgotten your credentials.

errors.description: The account has been locked due to too many failed login attempts (typically 5 within 15 minutes).
errors.resolution: Wait 15 minutes for automatic unlock, or contact support to manually unlock the account.

errors.description: The account has been disabled by an administrator, possibly due to terms of service violations.
errors.resolution: Contact customer support to inquire about account status and potential reactivation.

errors.description: The authenticated user does not have permission to perform this action. This may be due to role restrictions or resource ownership.
errors.resolution: Verify that the user has the required role or permissions for this operation. Check if the resource belongs to the user.

errors.description: The user's role does not include the specific permission required for this operation.
errors.resolution: Contact an administrator to request the necessary permissions, or use an account with appropriate access.

errors.description: Certain operations require a verified email address. The user's email has not been verified yet.
errors.resolution: Check email for the verification link, or use the resendVerificationEmail mutation to request a new one.

errors.description: The current session was explicitly revoked, possibly due to password change, logout from all devices, or security concern.
errors.resolution: Authenticate again to obtain a new session.
